PERSONA:
meet robert, a 58-year-old married white man residing in a non-metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. he holds a postgraduate degree and identifies himself as a conservative republican with an annual family income of less than $30,000.

robert was born and raised in another country outside the united states but has been a u.s. citizen for over 21 years. he is agnostic and does not attend any religious services, aligning with the unaffiliated religious category.

politically, robert leans towards conservative ideologies and strongly supports the republican party. he is a registered voter and stays informed by using the internet several times a day.

despite his educational achievements, robert's family income falls into the lower-income tier. he does not actively participate in volunteerism activities.

robert leads a relatively private life, residing in a non-metropolitan area with his wife. his background, political leanings, and financial situation shape his worldview and experiences.
